lines.text: How about that goat? Does it belong to the toast?
Goat farmers don't usually break windows, take goats through windows, then tie those goats up in a room they're burglarizin'.
It's pretty nonstandard goat farmer activity.
...Oh, dang, %THEYRE% right. ''Maaaaaaa''... that makes it impossible.
Yeah, never mind. Scratch the goat farmer thing.
